properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lazao ilay tantara,
Tantaran’i Kristy.
Tantara mamin’ny foko,
Mitory fitia.
Fitiavana ambony,
Indro natolony.
Mitondra famonjena,
Ho an’ny olony.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Lazao ilay tantara,
Torio lazao tsara.
Aza avelanao hitoetra tsy hahalala
Ireo namanao tonga ao, ao am-bala.
O ……………………………

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tiako ho re hatrany,
Ilay tantara soa.
Fa loharano mamy,
Mamelona tokoa.
Tantara mampisava
ny haizin’ny fo,
Mampahery ny ory,
‘Reo reraka ao am-po.
Lazao ilay tantara, torio sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tiako ho re hatrany,
Ilay tantara soa.
Fa loharano mamy,
Mamelona tokoa.
Tantara mampisava
ny haizin’ny fo,
Mampahery ny ory,
‘Reo reraka ao am-po.
Lazao ilay tantara, torio sns.
